actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 30-percent tax increase on highway gasoline, diesel fuel, and kerosene imposed by the 1993 tax bill.
short_title: Emergency Tax Relief for Motorists and Truckers Act of 2000

summary.text: Emergency Tax Relief for Motorists and Truckers Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the taxes on highway gasoline, diesel fuel, and kerosene.

titles.title: Emergency Tax Relief for Motorists and Truckers Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 30-percent tax increase on highway gasoline, diesel fuel, and kerosene imposed by the 1993 tax bill.
